get.summary: AllBalances queries the balance of all coins for a single account.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: address is the address to query balances for.

parameters.name: pagination.key
parameters.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.

parameters.name: pagination.offset
parameters.description:
offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable.
It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should
be set.

parameters.name: pagination.limit
parameters.description:
limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page.
If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.

parameters.name: pagination.count_total
parameters.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs. count_total
is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key is set.

get.summary: Balance queries the balance of a single coin for a single account.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: address is the address to query balances for.

parameters.name: denom
parameters.description: denom is the coin denom to query balances for.

get.summary: Params queries the parameters of x/bank module.
TotalSupply queries the total supply of all coins.
SupplyOf queries the supply of a single coin.

parameters.name: denom
parameters.description: denom is the coin denom to query balances for.

v1beta1Coin.description:
Coin defines a token with a denomination and an amount.

NOTE: The amount field is an Int which implements the custom method
signatures required by gogoproto.

key.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.

offset.description:
offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable.
It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should
be set.

limit.description:
limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page.
If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.

count_total.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs. count_total
is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key is set.

v1beta1PageRequest.title:
PageRequest is to be embedded in gRPC request messages for efficient
pagination. Ex:

next_key.title:
next_key is the key to be passed to PageRequest.key to
query the next page most efficiently

total.title:
total is total number of results available if PageRequest.count_total
was set, its value is undefined otherwise

v1beta1PageResponse.title:
PageResponse is to be embedded in gRPC response messages where the corresponding
request message has used PageRequest

v1beta1Params.description: Params defines the set of bank parameters.

balances.description: balances is the balances of all the coins.

pagination.description: pagination defines the pagination in the response.

v1beta1QueryAllBalancesResponse.description: QueryAllBalancesResponse is the response type for the Query/AllBalances RPC method.

balance.description: balance is the balance of the coin.

v1beta1QueryBalanceResponse.description: QueryBalanceResponse is the response type for the Query/Balance RPC method.

v1beta1QueryParamsResponse.description: QueryParamsResponse defines the response type for querying x/bank parameters.

amount.description: amount is the supply of the coin.

v1beta1QuerySupplyOfResponse.description: QuerySupplyOfResponse is the response type for the Query/SupplyOf RPC method.

supply.title: supply is the supply of the coins

v1beta1QueryTotalSupplyResponse.title: QueryTotalSupplyResponse is the response type for the Query/TotalSupply RPC method

v1beta1SendEnabled.title: Send enabled configuration properties for each denomination
